text: abatement of property taxes interest rate amend rsa to read as follows interest whenever after taxes have been paid the selectmen the board of tax and land appeals or the superior court as the case may be grant an abatement of taxes they shall award interest on the amount of taxes abated at the rate of percent per annum from the date the taxes were paid to the date of refund applicability the amendment to rsa by section of this act shall apply to taxable periods beginning on or after april
